website_summaries.verdict: Just like Clinique's top-selling Quickliner with one major difference: it's available in numerous bold colors for looks that fit your unique style.
pros: Comes in 10 bold colors, from classic black to flattering browns, greens, and purples
Colors are highly pigmented and buildable for creating dramatic looks
Pencil eyeliner is creamy and easy to work with
No sharpener is needed to get a fine point
cons: Some users report eyeliner transferring to contact lenses, resulting in blur

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: I have started developing allergies to eye makeup, especially eyeliner. My old favorites cause a lot of irritation, and my eyes turn red. This eyeliner has so far not irritated my eyes at all. It applies easily and does not wear off too quickly or smear too much. It is black with just a hint of blue - sounds odd but it does not look blue after applied.
customer_reviews.author: Ruediger G.

customer_reviews.title: Never buy Clinique eyeliner on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy Clinique eyeliner on Amazon! The eyeliner was packaged in a box that Clinique no longer uses. I know because I usually buy the eye liner in a department store. I ordered it a few months ago and just opened it up today and the eyeliner is so old that it is unusable. You have to press very hard, as in writing with it, to make it show up. I have missed the date by which I needed to return it. There is nothing to do but throw it out. Beware. Never buy Clinique products on Amazon. You can’t be sure that it isn’t old and unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart M. Butler

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: This product was defective! The mechanism does not twist rendering it useless after 2-3 uses!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you have sensitive skin use this
customer_reviews.text: I had almost forgotten what is to not have rashes. This is one of the only eye liners that does not cause me allergies. I love it! The pencil is so creamy and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Teresita C. G. Nader

customer_reviews.title: Full price for twice used and gone? 🙄
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for years and love it, but getting it here? Never again. Used it twice and the product is done. People and their petty scams...and for people like me that are retired and have little money to spare..shame on you.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: And easy to pply eyeliner was only a pipe dream in the 60's. Finally someone made one, with good colors. I rubbed my eye recently and instantly it was itchy and burning. I may be sensitive to the eyeliner. I don't know. I'll edit this review if I am. It migrates and smears a bit on my upper lid by the end of the day, but does not smear under my eye.
customer_reviews.author: Southwest Woman

customer_reviews.title: Won't turn to reload
customer_reviews.text: I have read other reviews stating that this eyeliner won't turn itself up to "reload" and am having the same problem. You're better off going to a brick and mortar store for this product. I love Clinique eyeliners but this one was a dud.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie J. Orwan

customer_reviews.title: The best eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for years and love it. The liner is soft enough to make a good line but not too soft. It's also not too hard. Eye lining is easy and I'm glad I don't have to go to the mall to buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Louise D. Somes

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Durable.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff stays put all day. Only smears if you mess with it, no running or smudges. The grey is really great too, a bit more subtle than black and compliments blue eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Meowface

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: I use this eye liner to line the top and bottom of my water line. Works great and it stays on for a good couple hours, but will have to reapply again and the color does fade off. I really like the twist feature so you don't have to keep using a sharpener which will eat away your eyeliner.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: My favorite for daily wear.
customer_reviews.text: I regularly purchase this eye liner in this color. It goes on very easily, and stays on for approximately 10 hours. It washes off easily too. I like that you can twist it to instead of using a eye liner with a sharpener.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Grauer

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as the Macy's Clinique product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this from Amazon when the Malls were closed because it seemed to be the same product. Not so. It does not apply smoothly, in fact its necessary to rub back and forth several times before any eyeliner is seen at all. I am aware many brands have different lines of products for different outlets, but if you are used to the Clinique eyeliner at Macy's or L & T, steer clear of this one!
customer_reviews.author: PatRose

customer_reviews.title: Great Color and Smooth Lines
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan of some Clinique skin care and makeup and their Quickliner is great - it goes on smooth and does not cake! And, the Intense Chocolate is so much better than black with my eyes (green) and skin tone. The price online was about 40% less than what I pay at Nordstrom or Macys so I bought a couple. Having it delivered to my door in a couple of days and not having to fight the traffic at the mall was just icing on thee cake!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley M.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Intense ebony is more of a true black. Intense black does have a blue hue to it. I love this stuff! Easy to smudge and it stays put all day!
customer_reviews.author: smithdv

customer_reviews.title: 40x less product than advertised
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as .48oz is .01 oz way off will request a refund
customer_reviews.author: Bill F

customer_reviews.title: Very inferior
customer_reviews.text: It is very dry. Not creamy like other Clinique products i bought at Ulta. Very very hard to use and big disappointment
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Ummmmm...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this eyeliner...but don't buy it here...it's a rip off....mine will not twist. Only got like two uses out of it. :(
customer_reviews.author: R&ZOREILLY

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: As has been mentioned in other reviews the eyeliner won’t turn to refill so was useless after 2 applications. It was either defective or empty when I received it. I am returning it. It does not look the same as the ones sold at Ulta.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: good & easy for eveyone
customer_reviews.text: easy on an old lady! like the clove instead of black as the age goes up. like that it can be everyday perfectly natural. did not like the largeness of the “smoother”
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Madsen

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: It’s pricey but it’s the best eyebrow pencil that I’ve ever used!
customer_reviews.author: Van1121

customer_reviews.title: Nice product easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for years. Nice product easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: D A ReaFin

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not Intense Plum. It was dried out grey, very hard to apply. It was my first time ordering online. I usually go to Macy's to get this eyeliner so it's not the first time I've used this product. I do love it so will go back to Macy's instead of order online. Will not ever order from here again. Buyer beware! You only have 7 days to return and has to be in original box and not used. I returned anyway (just because) and will get 20% back.
customer_reviews.author: Dorise s.

customer_reviews.title: Won't turn to advance eye liner!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this online and didn't need to use it for a month or two. Once I did, the turning device wasn't working. It just clicks and doesn't advance the eye liner. Very frustrating as it it too late to return it.
customer_reviews.author: ID Prof

customer_reviews.title: Have used product with same name before and it was excellent
customer_reviews.text: Completely dried out - did not realize until too late to return. Have used product with same name before and it was excellent
customer_reviews.author: mary e baez

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Same quality of the ones I buy at Ulta, I just didn't have time to go to the store. Came unused and clean, in the box
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: It lasted about a week
customer_reviews.text: There was hardly any of the product in the tube. Do not waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda L. Jocz

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Mom only trusts this brand of makeup and loves this shade! Never irritates her eyes and lasts all day
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Kissinger

customer_reviews.title: Bunk product
customer_reviews.text: I had the same issue as others mentioned- there is only enough product for 3-4 uses. I bought this plum color from Clinique directly and it lasted about 7 months. Not sure if they got a bulk discount on a defective product or what, but this isn’t worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy again
customer_reviews.text: I only use Clinique eye makeup I expected this eyeliner to be like dozens that I’ve bought before, but this purchase is dried out and I’m ready to through it away.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey L.

customer_reviews.title: Dried out & non-functional upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: This is a product I have purchased at department and beauty stores in the past & have loved it. This is the first time I have ever bought it from amazon, and I won’t ever buy makeup from here a again because the makeup seems old and dried out. It doesn’t “draw” on they eyes as it should. I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Johnson

customer_reviews.title: great if you want something between black and brown
customer_reviews.text: Been getting this for years, great if you want something between black and brown. Good with blue eyes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Goes on well and nice black color, but doesn’t last long. Seems to wear off in a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Tthomp3

customer_reviews.title: Worst eye liner ever
customer_reviews.text: I would strongly recommend against buying this product. The quality is very bad- the color is so light it is hardly visible despite applying it several times. After a couple of days, the black projector that we use to apply liner broke making this product completely useless. Worst product ever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clinique Eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this eyeliner for the 1st time about 2 years ago because Sephora was out of the one really liked. I was pleasantly when I purchased the Clinique. The price was a lot cheaper and it actually worked without smearing under my eyes making me look like a raccoon.
customer_reviews.author: DAH

customer_reviews.title: Best Eyeliner EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this eyeliner 👍have used for a long time. So glad to be able to get it on Amazon. It a soft pencil & so easy to apply. It lasts👏
customer_reviews.author: JEMJEM

customer_reviews.title: Soft and smooth to apply
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used clinique for 15 years or more. Absolutely love this eyeliner. It goes on like soft butter.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy, basically no product in the liner
customer_reviews.text: It only has a little tip of liner, it’s like it’s been used and there is nothing left of the product, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: have to be careful on how long you make the point. it can break easily
customer_reviews.author: Patrice Antony

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I paid full price for a sample size. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Melissa D. Rafferty

customer_reviews.title: JUST WANT THE WIFE WANTED
customer_reviews.text: EXACTLY WHAT MY WIFE BOUGHT FROM THE BIG DEPARTMENT STORES, ONLY SHE COULDN'T RECEIVE HER POINTS FOR HER PURCHASE WITH CLINIQUE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Well this is a best eyeliner i have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Glides easily better than other make up
customer_reviews.text: Clinique glides the make up on smoothly and evenly than other brands. order came right away. Great to do business with.
customer_reviews.author: Golden Girl

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but pricey
customer_reviews.text: I like the ease of use but I think the volume of the product is lacking for the price. Still, I buy it because it is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Hansen

customer_reviews.title: worth it
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this. Pencil for years. He goes on so much easier and smoother than cheaper brands.
customer_reviews.author: kristin mayo

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Worst liner ever! I opened the package, tried to use it, and almost immediately, the eyeliner tip fell off! Went straight in the trash. Wasted money. Don't buy this. You can find better stuff at the beauty supply section of your local pharmacy.
customer_reviews.author: susan nezami

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color!
customer_reviews.text: It goes on smooth, stays all day, and rinses off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. The deep navy is a perfect color!! It keeps liner from being too harsh looking. I will keep ordering!’
customer_reviews.author: Pink

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this eyeliner for a while, I love it! Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: just okay
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be a harder and thicker crayon like Clinique was in the past. It goes on in a very, very thin line. The color appears as black instead of plum.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a week and it ran out. I have always bought the Clinique eye pencils and this is horrible! I will never purchase this from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Easy and lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.text: I got the eyeliner pencil and it does not look like the picture here, but I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kachina

customer_reviews.title: Never buy Clinique from Amazon .. old products
customer_reviews.text: Quick liner Intense Chocolate— ordered twice.. both were unusable.. old.. worthless to late to return one of them
customer_reviews.author: nancy t

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Liner was defective. Product did not last more then 3 uses and pencil wouldn't rotate up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item defective
customer_reviews.text: The item was defective and would not advance in its tube. I have requested return
customer_reviews.author: Carla A.

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: The eyeliner doesn't twist out. Must be broken. So just wasted money on something I can only use a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Meagann

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Would never order again. Had only used several times & eyeliner pencil fell out. Waste of my money. Would company replace???
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner pen is defective. It will not allow me to roll it up when I twist the pen. I got a full 2 uses out of it when it should’ve lasted me 6 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this eye liner, but it doesn’t last very long.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic eye liner, but there’s just not enough in it to make it last. It runs out way too quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ford

customer_reviews.title: Love the color.
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and does not cause irritation to my eyes.

customer_reviews.title: No TWIST
customer_reviews.text: I should have gone to the Clinique counter!!! Liner will not twist up.... What good will it do?????

customer_reviews.title: Love this eyeliner!!!
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner goes on so smooth !! Very fast delivery!!!

customer_reviews.title: Plum eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Great look especially for green or blue eyes. Glides on smoothly and stays on the entire day. Love the look

customer_reviews.title: It’s not black at all
customer_reviews.text: After using this it looked like I have applied purple color liner.

customer_reviews.title: Eyeliner does not work!
customer_reviews.text: Eyeliner no longer works, just will not apply at all.

customer_reviews.title: INTENSE PLUM

customer_reviews.author: Fay Clymer

customer_reviews.title: Product was dried up
customer_reviews.text: This product was all dried up and could not be used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't come in closed wrap. Was falling out of ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come in closed wrap. Was falling out of Clinique box. Scared of eye diseases, pink eye etc. Don't know where it has been or who has touched. But keeping, throwing caution to the wind cause need this item.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn

customer_reviews.title: INTENSE MIDNIGHT
customer_reviews.text: bOUGHT AS A GIFT...WILL TAKE IT TO ISRAEL WITH ME.. THE PRODUCTS FROM CLINIQUE ARE ALWAYS GREAT. MY DAUGHTER-IN-LAW USES THE EXCLUSIVELY.
customer_reviews.author: Fay Clymer

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY..FAKE AND CAUSED ME AN EYE INFECTION
customer_reviews.text: I do not like to write a bad review, however this is enough. I Purchased straight from Clinique and from Amazon. The eyeliner from Clinique is not set my eyes at all because it’s a genic and it is. The one I purchased on here gave me an eye infection and it made my eyes burn and water. I’m so disappointed. I can’t believe able to be sold. STAY AWAY..NOT REAL
customer_reviews.author: danielle

customer_reviews.title: Good product, bad application mechanism
customer_reviews.text: The formula is amazing...glides on, stays on, and doesn’t irritate my sensitive dry eyes! I deducted a star because the twist mechanism doesn’t work and I had to return it. Product is good, but useless if if can’t be applied after first time. I may try it again, but will buy from Clinique rather than Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: CJfromCT

customer_reviews.title: favorite eyeliner!
customer_reviews.text: Love this liner. It is so easy and QUICK to apply. I've gotten to wear I can do it in one swipe on each lid. The color lasts all day and you can make it as thin or thick as you'd like. The texture of the liner itself feels good too - very smooth and soft.
customer_reviews.author: bpowers2

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Very overpriced for the amount of eyeliner you get. The product dispenser is an waste of raw materials. Way too long dispenser with minimal product. Don’t need the rubber end either.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen5689

customer_reviews.title: Fake!!! Not real clinique
customer_reviews.text: I have very badd I allergies this is not the clinique allergy tested as soon as I applied my eyes instantly turned red and started to burn
customer_reviews.author: kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have been allergic to makeup in the past but not this one!
customer_reviews.author: L. Zauche

customer_reviews.title: Great Liner!
customer_reviews.text: I use black eyeliner almost daily - only on the bottom of the eye & this liner is great! Texture is just soft enough that it goes right on with no re-line & re-line, etc The only flaw is that the liner itself could be a little wider.
customer_reviews.author: robinlew6112

customer_reviews.title: Clinque eye liner
customer_reviews.text: It goes on smooth does not roll out easily if not carefully you will break off and lose a lot of eyeliner. I would not buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: This is a great eyeliner and color. Good for all skin colors.

customer_reviews.text: First eyeliner I've ever used that actually stays in place! This charcoal color is great.

customer_reviews.title: Tip broke after 3 uses
